                                                                                                     throws ResourceNotFound
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • deleteEmployee

        @DeleteMapping(value="/employee/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> deleteEmployee(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                              int id)
                                                                                                       throws ResourceNotFound
        Delete employee with given id, it will first check whether employee with given identifier is exits into database or not
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the employee you want to delete
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFound - If system doesn't find any employee with given identifier then it will throw ResourceNotFound Exception

      • updateEmployee

        @PutMapping(value="/employee/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateEmployee(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                           int id,
                                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                                           Employee employee)
                                                                                                    throws ResourceNotFound
        update the existing employee into the database, it will first check whether employee with given identifier is exits into database or not
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the employee you want to update
        employee - employee object with the data you want to update
        Returns:
        updated return updated employee object
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFound - If Employee with the specified id is not exits then it will throw ResorceNotFound Exception
